thread.section_title: The Nadler Soho - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent locatiom
thread.title_full: Excellent locatiom - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Skafti56
title: Excellent locatiom
text: Quiet, neat, no flaws of any kind. Classic interior, could use a bit of imagination. We had the smallest type of room with a small bed to save a bit money. OK for us, but many would find it too small, just a matter of payment. For breakfast, I highly recommend The Soho Balans Society, open 24 hrs. Try their Granola yogurt with berries or breakfast Burrito.
